front.title: Security Routing Service based on Public Key for Low-Power Wireless Networks

abstract.t: This memo specifies a security protocol based on public key matrix for Internet of Things. All public keys MUST be generated by only one public key seed and the corresponding private key MUST be secret information for adversary. Each node can indirectly authenticate the identity of other nodes without digital signature. This protocol is REQUESTED Public/Private Key Pre-distribution service, Initial Session Key Establishment service, Session Key Update service and Data Encryption Service.
